Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Brian Kern
Reviews.Content: This is my first dslr. Chose the SONY because it has the image stabilizer in the body so lenses are usually cheaper than those for a nikon or cannon which have the stabilizer mounted in the lenses. I am extremely happy with the quality of the pictures this camera takes by far the clearest and most crisp pictures I have ever taken.

Reviews.Title: Nice small DSLR solution
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: Great solution for a small option in a DSLR.  Purchased as a complement to a NEX system for OS on long tele lenses.  Good solution.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Mavis
Reviews.Content: Lightweight, easy to use and my lenses fit.  This was a good price and the camera arrived in perfect condition and at the early end of the delivery range.  We're birders, so great detail is needed for good pictures and this camera delivers.

Reviews.Title: Sony Alfa A37
Reviews.Author: D. Nowak
Reviews.Content: Great camera . Fits perfectly my Minolta lenses.I took some pictures and recorded a video. It looks like I'm going to love it. There's only one minus with this camera-rechargeable battery. I always used AA with Canon . It was very convienient  ,especially abroad.The price was great.
